column4: it's not an ahrdware issue cause with anoter live distro the wired works
what does that have to do with your wireless card. Dont clutter your questtion like that. Can you rephrase what you would like?
both wired and wirelss are recognized, but the wired one can only ping itself and not the pc on the lan
do you need us to help you with the wired, or wireless?
OK, so, what does the LAN work on? a router?
that is the router IP address? do you have the ubuntu computer beside you? type ifconfig and tell us the IP address you have tghere.
and you can not ping google, and you can not browse the web?
i can't ping the router so interent is not working
maybe you turned off pinging on your router... Anyhow, you have a proper IP address, I do not see why you would not be able to surf. post your /etc/network/interfaces file to paste.ubuntulinux.nl
i can ping the router from other pc... this is the paste
why a static IP addresss? use dhcp for your router.
i wanna use staic ip address
then set it up at the router, not at the computer.
do you think you know how to set up the static Ip at the router? if not, read its manual, I bet its available online.
